text:
The javadoc for PageContext.include() has said, since JSP 1.0, that it does a 
flush().  Tomcat initially didn't, but in Tomcat 3.2.1, a flush() was added 
[October '00].

The JSP 1.2 javadoc & spec still say that PageContext.include() does a flush
().  Although if we were to define the semantics we would not make that 
requirement, it seems that, for backwards compatibility, we need to do a flush
().

I've started a poll on the vendors, and so far I have:

 * does a flush(): Silverstream [[Tomcat 3.2.1]]
 * does not do a flush(): Macromedia, TOmcat 4.0
